title: Workmaster 25  I welded a quick attach plow first time out.

tasks.task: Set up and operate a custom plow for clearing snow from a parking lot.
subtasks: Weld a plate to a plow blade.
Install angle cylinders on the plow.
Attach pins to secure the plow to the tractor.
Start the tractor and lower the plow to the ground.
Drive the tractor and adjust the plow angle for effective snow removal.
Clear snow from the parking lot by pushing it backward and forth.
Release the plow to dump collected snow.
Reverse the plow angle for dumping and monitor for hydraulic issues.
Navigate around obstacles in the parking lot and barn while operating the plow.
Check the pressure and release hydraulic tension.
Use tractor batteries to assist with hydraulic functions.
Inspect welds for structural integrity after operation.
Evaluate the performance of the plow's angle cylinders.

tasks.task: Record progress and share via video.
subtasks: Film setup and operation of the plow.
Engage in commentary and demonstration during plowing.
Publish video on a channel, requesting viewer interaction.
